message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I'd like to propose a price of $95 to purchase the item.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
